name: Starter
description: A clean, modern digital presence designed to help new daycare centers get discovered online.
features: Basic brand refresh (colors, fonts, simple logo enhancement)
Custom 4-page website built with Next.js, Tailwind, and Vercel
Contact form integration (email or simple CRM-lite tool)
Basic SEO setup (titles, descriptions, alt tags)
ideal: New daycares establishing an online presence
Small centers with outdated or no website

name: Growth
description: A stronger digital presence built to attract more parents and improve trust.
features: Expanded brand kit (logo refinements, color palette, typography guide)
Social media kit (10 customizable Canva templates)
Custom 6-page website built with Next.js, Tailwind, and Vercel
Online booking integration (Calendly or embedded form)
Enhanced SEO with on-page optimization & keyword guidance

name: Premium
description: A polished, high-converting digital ecosystem tailored for daycares aiming to stand out and grow.
features: Deeper brand identity upgrade (extended palette, secondary logos, patterns)
Custom 8-page premium website built with Next.js, Tailwind, and Vercel
Advanced booking flows (waitlist form, inquiry categories, automated email replies)
Parent resource center (PDFs, menus, calendars — client provides content)
Local SEO enhancements (schema markup + additional citations)
